def_cn: (尤指音乐或时尚风格上的)混合，融合
def_en: A crossover of one style and another, especially in music or fashion, is a combination of the two different styles.

def_cn: (在音乐或时尚上的)转型，改变风格
def_en: In music or fashion, if someone makes a crossover from one style to another, they become successful outside the style they were originally known for.
